text: our world is filled with smiling faces
from Namibia to Lebanon to Malaysia and
every country in between as I've said
many times in the past 99.9% of human
beings are kind and hospitable and then
there's the Philippines whose people
take friendliness to a completely new
level no matter which one of the seven
thousand plus islands you are visiting
it's so easy to strike up a conversation
with anyone a police officer a street
vendor hello is it me you're looking for
tricycle driver or grandmother they will
always treat you with respect
addressing you as ma'am or sir / feeding
you and making sure you are safe because
chances are they want to talk to you
more than you want to talk to them
unlike most countries in Asia you never
have to worry about a language barrier
in the Philippines because English is a
first or second language for almost
everyone street signs are in English
songs are in English even the news is in
English communication is one less thing
to worry about as a traveler which makes
life a whole lot easier sometimes I read
online or hear people say that the
Philippines is dangerous and that could
not be farther from the truth I've never
once felt scared threatened or
intimidated after spending more than
seven months here of course crime exists
everywhere but you have to be looking
for it to find it as long as you take
normal precautions then I guarantee
you'll have fun after all the country
slogan is it's more fun in the
Philippines you can take my word that
the Philippines has the happiest and
friendliest people in the world
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world it's electric it's sexy its
tasty it's confusing but above all it's
futuristic the Japanese are innovators
they somehow
